mapper.select: select rownum, b.* from (select rownum as rm, a.* from(select * from board order by bonum desc)a)b where b.rm>=#{startRow} and b.rm<=#{endRow}
mapper.update: update board set re_step=re_step+1 where ref=#{ref} and re_step>#{re_step}
mapper.select: select upload from board where num=#{num}
